      • RequestTokens

        public java.util.List<java.util.UUID> RequestTokens(java.util.UUID customerId,
                                                    int quantity)
                                             throws TokenQuantityException,
                                                    EntryNotFoundException
        Specified by:
        RequestTokens in interface ITokenManager
        Parameters:
        customerId - which customer to give tokens
        quantity - amount of tokens to give
        Returns:
        a list of the token id's given to the customer
        Throws:
        TokenQuantityException - thrown when the customer cannot request anymore tokens
        EntryNotFoundException - thrown when the customer does not exist

      • GetTokens

        Parameters:
        customerId - which account to search for
        Returns:
        list of all tokens owned by a customer

      • UseToken

        public void UseToken(java.util.UUID tokenId)
              throws TokenException
        Specified by:
        UseToken in interface ITokenManager
        Parameters:
        tokenId - id of the token to use
        Throws:
        TokenException - when the token cannot be used, either because it is already spent or it does not exist

      • RequestToken

        public java.util.UUID RequestToken(java.util.UUID customerId)
                            throws EntryNotFoundException,
                                   TokenQuantityException
        Specified by:
        RequestToken in interface ITokenManager
        Parameters:
        customerId - id of the customer to search for
        Returns:
        a single new token given to the customer
        Throws:
        EntryNotFoundException - thrown when the customer does not exist
        TokenQuantityException - thrown when the customer cannot request anymore tokens

        Returns:
